tool.name: Run VIPER

tool.help:
Usage: run_arachne2regulon.R [options]
Options: -d DIR, --dir=DIR Full path to outdir.
-e EXPR, --expr=EXPR Full path to input expression matrix used to build ARACNE network.
-n NETWORK, --network=NETWORK Full path to ARACNE network.txt.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
